title: The Secrets to Traveling Alone
itunes:title: The Secrets to Traveling Alone
description:
This week fashion entrepreneur Lisa Sun provides a laundry list of tips on how to make sure  your China trip goes off without a hitch. Also, Mark and Nikki talk about traveling alone: How to do it safely, how to eat alone without being embarrassed, and one place to avoid when you're solo

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
